component.name: qFlipper
component.summary: Desktop application for updating Flipper Zero firmware via PC

description.p: Graphical desktop application for updating Flipper Zero firmware via PC.

ul.li: Update Flipper's firmware and supplemental data with a press of one button
Stream Flipper's display and control it remotely
Backup and restore settings, progress and pairing data
Automatic self-update feature * Command line interface
